post.summary: Add contract relationships to the organization.
post.description: This endpoint adds contract relationships to the organization with the supplied id.

requestBody.description: The contract relationships to be added to the organization.

204.description: The contract relationships have been added.

delete.summary: Delete contract relationships from an organization.
delete.description: This endpoint deletes contract relationships from the organization with the supplied id.

requestBody.description: The contract relationships to be deleted from the organization.

204.description: The contract relationships have been deleted.
